name: Faux 3D Head Demo
description:
This is just a little faux 3d fun test I made in 2013.  The code I used for it ended up being part of my Fortune Teller game.

Credit where it's due: The image for the female face is from a screenshot I took in Daz3d poser of the Victoria v4 model with a slightly customized texture.

Want to support my free games?  I sell merchandise featuring characters and designs from some of my most well received games. Every purchase helps me to not starve on my way to releasing my next game!
